# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer: General Maintenance Services
### Services d'entretien général - Nouvelle-Écosse

## Tender Number and Details
* Tender Number: PW-22-01007167
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: M4000-2-5850
* Publication Date: September 14, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 14, 2022 (1:00 PM AST)

## Background and Requirements
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified offerors to submit proposals for a standing offer agreement to provide general maintenance services for employee housing and RCMP detachments in Nova Scotia.

## Services Required
The selected offeror shall provide a range of services, including:
* Construction services (Miscellaneous)
* Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning maintenance and inspection
* Plumbing contractor services
* Electrical installations and major repairs
* Painting work
* Flooring contractors
* Carpentry and flooring
* Interior fit-up/renovations

## Evaluation Criteria
Offers must comply with the requirements of the Request for Standing Offers to be declared responsive. The responsive offer with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for issuance of a standing offer.

## Security and Integrity Provisions
A security requirement is associated with this Request for Standing Offer. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, and the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Sandra Bremner
Procurement Officer
ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
902-720-5355

## Tender Documents
Tender documents, including the solicitation document and amendments, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

## Important Notice
Canada is not responsible for the information found on websites of third parties. Bidders must regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information. Canada will not be liable for any oversight on the Bidder's part nor for notification services offered by a third party.
